about_the_game:
Inspiring ballads is an RPG set in an open fantasy world. Get reliable equipment, create powerful magic, pick up a sword and decide your fate and the fate of the inhabitants of the entire island! Become the new ballad hero!

  • A classless system. Choose who you want to be: a brutal warrior, a destructive magician, a mobile fighter, a master of poisoning - or find an even more effective way.

  • Several schools of magic, including hidden ones.

  • Create equipment from trophies from enemies.

  • Dozens of types of opponents.

  • The inhabitants of the island, who were just waiting for you to solve their problems.

  • The opportunity to win over representatives of the opposite sex.

  • There are several endings - from the most obvious to the hidden and very hidden.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that is not suitable for all ages. It contains adult content: battles and murders of opponents, images of partially nude nature, hints of scenes of a sexual nature.
